info.author: Kai Diefenbach
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
EasyShop Package Readme
=======================

Overview
--------

EasyShop is an out-of-the-box online shop for Plone.

Installation
------------

To get started you will simply need to add the package to your "eggs" and "zcml" sections, run 
buildout, restart your Plone instance and install the "EasyShop" package via the "Add-on Products" 
section in "Site Setup".

Disclaimer
----------
EasyShop is alpha and therefore not stable concerning to API, implementation and features. Don't 
expect ootb backwards compatibility or migration from one alpha release to the next.

But it might be of interest that there is a live shop (http://www.demmelhuber.net/shop) which runs for 
over 18 months stable and successful 
now.

More Information
----------------

- http://www.geteasyshop.com
  Main site with feature list, faqs and more 
  
- http://code.google.com/p/easyshop-for-plone/
  Code repository
  
- http://groups.google.de/group/easyshop
  Google Group for EasyShop
info.name: easyshop.core
info.summary: An out-of-the-box online shop for Plone.
info.html_description:
Overview

EasyShop is an out-of-the-box online shop for Plone.

Installation

To get started you will simply need to add the package to your “eggs” and “zcml” sections, run buildout, restart your Plone instance and install the “EasyShop” package via the “Add-on Products” section in “Site Setup”.

Disclaimer

EasyShop is alpha and therefore not stable concerning to API, implementation and features. Don’t expect ootb backwards compatibility or migration from one alpha release to the next.

But it might be of interest that there is a live shop (http://www.demmelhuber.net/shop) which runs for over 18 months stable and successful now.

More Information

  • http://www.geteasyshop.com Main site with feature list, faqs and more
  • http://code.google.com/p/easyshop-for-plone/ Code repository
  • http://groups.google.de/group/easyshop Google Group for EasyShop
